meta.name: keywords
meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Hannah Spector Sharla Zwirek John Erler Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #6335.

td.p: Hannah Spector, a stay-at-home mom from Van Nuys, California
Sharla Zwirek, an editorial manager from Medway, Massachusetts
John Erler, a movie mocker from Austin, Texas (whose 1-day cash winnings total $29,000)

tr.td: HORSETORY
FROM JOCK TO POLITICIAN
E BEFORE I
WE ALL MAKE CHOICES IN LIFE
SHAPE UP!
SHIP OUT

div.onmouseout: toggle('clue_J_1_1', 'clue_J_1_1_stuck', 'The horse panel is a set of 30,000-year-old drawings in the Chauvet cave, dating to this age')

a.title: Suggest a correction for this clue

tr.td: The horse panel is a set of 30,000-year-old drawings in the Chauvet cave, dating to this age

Hannah

body.div: The J! Archive is created by fans, for fans. The Jeopardy! game show and all elements thereof, including but not limited to copyright and trademark thereto, are the property of Jeopardy Productions, Inc. and are protected under law. This website is not affiliated with, sponsored by, or operated by Jeopardy Productions, Inc. Join the discussion at JBoard.tv.
